title: Dashboard BFF
notes: Dashboard BFF Worker complete: WhatsApp OTP auth (dev mode + WA_OUTBOUND), KV sessions (7d TTL), RBAC middleware, error handler, KV read-through cache, core-client proxy, all API routes (auth, schedule, assets, financials, alerts, settings), AppType export, ServiceResult moved to @keloia/shared. 28 tests passing across 5 test files.
